title: These D.C. Bars, Restaurants, And Venues Are Requiring Vaccination Proof To Enter
description: A growing list of D.C.-area bars and restaurants are requiring proof of vaccination or a negative COVID-19 test for entry.
cleaned_text: This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful. Privacy Overview
